heading: 2 Slack
text: Government Data Science - requires recognised email address every NHS/Local Authority listed. However, nhs.net acceptable.NHS-R Community - predominantly R related many channels like Git, Python Ethics. Membership open anyone interested health social care.

chapter: 3 Codes of Practice, regulation, and guidance
heading: 3 Codes of Practice, regulation, and guidance
text: BETA - NHS digital, data technology standards framework (2018) - framework outlines key standards clinical safety, use data, interoperability design interactions.Code conduct data-driven health care technology (2018) - code conduct contains set principles set expect suppliers users data-driven technologies.Code Practice Confidential Information (2014) - Good practice guidance organisations collecting, analysing, publishing otherwise disseminating confidential information concerning, connected , provision health services adult social care England.Confidentiality: NHS Code Practice (2003) - Sets standards required NHS organisations concerning patient confidentiality.Data Protection Act (2018) - Act makes provision processing personal dataData Sharing Code Practice - Note, process updated light Data Protection Act (2018). code explains Data Protection Act 1998 (DPA) applies sharing personal data. also provides good practice advice relevant organisations share personal data.EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)(2016) - GDPR regulates processing individual, company organisation personal data relating individuals EU.General Practice Extraction Service (GPES) Data pandemic planning research: guide analysts users data - guidance provides overview dataset analysts users General Practice Extraction Service (GPES) Data Pandemic Planning Research (GDPPR) provide information coronavirus (COVID-19) planning research.Government Analysis Functional Standard - “purpose Government Analysis Functional Standard set expectations planning undertaking analysis across government”Government Digital Service - Data Ethics Framework - “Data Ethics Framework guides appropriate responsible data use government wider public sector. helps public servants understand ethical considerations, address within projects, encourages responsible innovation.”Guidance - PHE Data Analysis Tools -Z - Data analysis tools across Public Health England (previously known ‘Data knowledge gateway’).HSCIC Guide Confidentiality (2013) - Shows health care workers , share information safely following rules confidentiality.Information Security Management: NHS Code Practice (2007) - Sets standards management information NHS organisations.NICE Evidence Standards Framework Digital Health Technologies (2019) - framework describes standards evidence available, developed, DHTs demonstrate value UK health care system. Intended use technology developers inform evidence development plans, decision makers areconsidering whether commission DHT.NHS information governance: legal professional obligations (2007) - Sets legal responsibilities management information NHS organisations.Office Statistics Regulation: Code Practice StatisticsThe Health Service (Control Patient Information) Regulations 2002 - Regulations make provision processing patient information, including confidential patient information.Records Management Code Practice Health Social Care 2016 - Sets people working NHS organisations England need manage records correctly. ’s based current legal requirements professional best practice published 20 July 2016 Information Governance Alliance (IGA).Health Service (Control Patient Information) Regulations 2002 - note Secretary State Health Social Care issued Notice Regulation 3(4) National Health Service (Control Patient Information Regulations) 2002 (COPI) require relevant organisations share confidential patient information organisations entitled process COPI COVID-19 purposes.UK Government’s National Data StrategyNationalData Strategy - ”document framework action government take data. final answer, part conversation way support use data UK. lay opportunities want realise, pillars identified core unlocking power data UK, missions must prioritise now.”future healthcare: vision digital, data technology health care (2018) - document sets government’s vision use technology, digital data within health care, meet needs users.Topol Review: independent report behalf Secretary State Health Social Care(2019) - Review makes recommendations enable NHS staff make innovative technologies genomics, digital medicine, artificial intelligence robotics. Clear argument made need develop continuous pipeline robotics engineers, data scientists technical specialists, can attracted NHS create new technological solutions improve care productivity.Health foundations blog open analytics https://towardsdatascience.com/towards-open-health-analytics--guide--sharing-code-safely--github-5d1e018897cb

heading: 4 Covid-19 specific resources
text: Corona Tech Handbook provides good overview information Corona related technology. See coronavirustechhandbook.com, specific research tools:Coronavirus Tech Handbook Technical Tools & Resources page information,
